traits.description: A measure of one's appreciation for art, emotion, adventure, unusual ideas, imagination, curiosity, and variety of experience.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you find yourself often curious about the world, eager to learn new things, and embracing unconventional ideas, this trait resonates with your innate desire to explore and create.

questions.text: I am quick to understand things.

traits.description: A measure of one's reliability, organization, punctuality, and ability to regulate and control impulses.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you're someone who values order, likes to set goals, and takes pride in being reliable, this trait captures your ability to navigate life with a clear sense of direction and purpose.

questions.text: I get chores done right away.

traits.description: A measure of one's energy, assertiveness, sociability, and the tendency to seek stimulation in the company of others.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you feel energized by being around people, enjoy engaging in conversations, and often find yourself in the role of a motivator, this trait reflects your natural inclination towards making connections and inspiring those around you.

questions.text: I am the life of the party.
I talk to a lot of different people at parties.

traits.description: A measure of one's tendency to be compassionate and cooperative rather than suspicious and antagonistic towards others.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you often find yourself helping others, striving for peace in your relationships, and showing understanding, this trait highlights your innate capacity for empathy and your ability to foster positive interactions.

questions.text: I take time out for others.

traits.description: A measure of one's tendency to experience emotional instability, anxiety, moodiness, irritability, and sadness.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you are someone who feels emotions deeply, whether it's joy or stress, and seeks to understand these feelings, this trait reflects your journey towards emotional awareness and resilience.
